entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:05 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 01:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -13.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -17.6°C
Wind: NE 37 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon then changing to freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain in the evening. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.summary: Showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
